title: I Went To Japan To Build A TINY Gaming PC...
description: *Today's video sponsor* Go sign up to Linode here:   We decided to drop by Tokyo Japan and build a tiny gaming system.  Link to the Sticker/Decal:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
